name: Allied with the Twins
flavor: The battlements bristled with spears and swords and scorpions, there was an archer at every crenel and arrowslit, the drawbridge was up, the portcullis down, the gates closed and barred.
text: Attached character gets +10 STR while defending.

name: Frozen Solid
text:
Attach to an attachment or location.
Treat attached attachment or location as though its text box were blank.

name: Northman's Grit
text: Attached character gets +3 STR and is immune to events.
flavor: "Bronze and iron are stronger than gold and silver" -Robb Stark

name: Arya Stark
text: Stealth. Deadly. Response: after you win a challenge, put Arya Stark into play from your hand.
flavor: "Who is going to say that she isn't Arya Stark?" -Jaime Lannister

name: Catelyn Stark
text: Immune to character abilities. Response: after Catelyn Stark is killed, choose a [stark] character in your dead pile. Then, put that character into play. [doomed]
flavor: "You bloody bastards cut her throat too deep for that. But she remembers."

name: Eddard Stark
text: Deadly. Renown. Response: after a [stark] character is killed, stand Eddard Stark. [doomed]
flavor: "No," Eddard said with sadness in his voice. "Now it ends."

name: Jojen Reed
text: Marshalling: kneel Jojen Reed and kneel 1 influence to name a card. Then, discard the top 3 cards of a player's deck. For each copy of the named card discarded, Jojen Reed claims a power.

name: Meera Reed
text: House Stark only. Stealth. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to put Meera Reed into play from your hand. Any Phase: kneel 1 influence to return Meera Reed to her owner's hand.

name: Shaggydog
text: No attachments. Deadly. While you control at least 1 [stark] Lord character, Shaggydog gets +3 STR and is immune to events.
flavor: The darkness sprang at him, snarling.

name: ∞ Northern Heir
text: Northern Heir does not kneel to defend. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to return Northern Heir from your dead pile to play.

name: Greatjon's Elite
text: No attachments. Deadly.
flavor: "Your attack must be so fiece that the Ironborn hav no leisure to wonder if anyone is creeping down on them from the north." -Robb Stark

name: House Stark Herald
text: Lower the cost for you to play <Army> characters by 1.
flavor: As the neared the Twins, Robb donned his crown and summoned Catelyn and Edmure to ride beside him.

name: Huntress in the Swamp
text: Stealth.
flavor: "There are ways through the Neck that are not on any map, Uncle. Ways known only to the crannogmen." -Robb Stark

name: Keeper of the New Gods
text: Any phase: kneel Keeper of the New Gods to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR.

name: Lookout
text: While Lookout is attacking, Army characters may not defend.
flavor: Catelyn's father's guards waited on the water stair with her brother.

name: Last Hearth's Finest
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
While there is at least one doomed card in any dead pile, Last Hearth's Finest does not kneel to attack.

name: The Iron Throne
text: Response: after a carde is placed into any player's dead pile, kneel The Iron Throne to reveal up to the top 2 cards of your deck, if able. Put any one character with cost 2 or lower thus revealed into play, and put the remaining cards on th ebottom of your deck in any order.

name: Winterfell Castle
text: Deathbound. Response: after you win a challenge as defender, each opponent must choose and kill a character he or she controls. [doomed]
flavor: Somewhere in the great stone maze of Winterfell, a wolf howled.

name: Broken Tower
text: Deathbound. Marshalling: kneel Broken Tower to lower the cost of the next [stark] card you play this phase by 1. [doomed]

name: Northern Fiefdoms
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Northern Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next [stark] card you play this phase by 1. +1 influence

name: Winterfell Barracks
text: Challenges: discard Winterfell Barracks from play (cannot be saved) to search your deck for a character and put that character into play. At the end of the phase, return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Gutter Rat's Cunning
text: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.
flavor: "Where's a gutter rat like Lumpyhead get him a sword?" -Lommy

name: Tywin's Protégé
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: after you win a challenge during which attached character participated, choose an attachment. Return that attachment to its owner's hand.

name: Cersei Lannister
text: Response: kneel Cersei Lannister and kneel 1 influence to cancel the effects of a character ability. Then, that character's controller must choose and discard a card from his or her hand. [doomed]
flavor: And it is not like her to choose a catspaw who would make such a royal botch of the killing.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
text:
Deadly.
Immune to opponent's character abilities.
[doomed]
flavor: "Believe what you will. I'm past caring what people say of me."

name: Tommen Baratheon
text: Response: after a character is killed, kneel 1 influence to have Tommen Baratheon claim 1 power (limit 3 per phase).
flavor: There was only one way Tommen would become king.

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Stealth. While Tyrion Lannister is participating in a challenge, he gains "Challenges: kneel 2 influence to change the current challenge to an [intrigue] challenge."

name: Tywin Lannister
text: Response: cancel the effects of an event card unless any player kneels 1 influence. [doomed]
flavor: "I owe you nothing."

name: ∞ Western Heir
text: Stealth. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to return Western Heir from your dead pile to play.

name: Enemy Informer
text: Response: after you play Enemy Informer from your hand, choose and kneel a character.
flavor: "Is everyone someone's informer in this cursed city?" -Eddard Stark

name: Expendable Ally
text: Response: discard Expendable Ally from play (cannot be saved) to cancel the effects of a character or location ability.
flavor: That's all it will take, and our noble allies will be at one another's throats.

name: Highgarden Reinforcements
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after you play Highgarden Reinforcements from your hand, draw 2 cards.
flavor: The golden rose of Highgarden was seen everywhere.

name: Joffrey's Herald
text: Any Phase: kneel Joffrey's Herald and kneel 2 influence to choose a character or location. Until the end of the phase, that character or location gains a House affiliation of your choice.

name: Littlefinger's Collectors
text: You may pay a +1 gold penalty (cannot be ignored) while playing Littlefinger's Collectors from your hand. Response: after you pay Littlefinger's Collectors with a gold penalty, each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand, if able.

name: Ser Armory's Poachers
text: While there is at least one doomed card in any dead pile, Ser Amory's Poachers gains stealth and renown.

name: Courtesan of Highgarden
flavor: "Our little rose has a good many ladies waiting in attendance on her, night and day." They stood behind her now, almost a dozen of them. -Lady Cersei Lannister

name: Casterly Rock
text: Deathbound. Challenges: kneel Casterly Rock to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, choose one of the following: that character gets -2 STR, that character loses an [intrigue] icon, or that character loses stealth and renown. [doomed]

name: The Iron Throne
text: Response: after a card is placed into any player's dead pile, kneel The Iron Throne to discard the top 3 cards of each opponent's deck.

name: Corrupt Treasury
text: Deathbound. Marshalling: kneel Corrupt Treasury to lower the cost of the next [lannister] card you play this phase by 1. [doomed]

name: Halls of the Red Keep
text: During [intrigue] challenges, raise the Claim value on each player's revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: The stones have ears in the Red Keep

name: Tywin's Manse
text: Response: after you win dominance, claim 1 power for your House.

name: Western Fiefdoms
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Western Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next [lannister] card you play this phase by 1. +1 influence

name: Chosen by R'hllor
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: after a player claims power for his or her House, stand attached character.
flavor:
"R'hllor chooses queerly, then."
-Stannis Baratheon

name: Stormlander's Pride
text: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains "Any phase: kneel 3 influence to stand this character."
flavor: "Humble?" Catelyn supplied. Renly laughed. "You must allow a king some flaws, my lady."

name: Melisandre
text: Deadly. Response: after a character claims power for renown, Melisandre claims 1 power. [doomed]
flavor: "Is it me your fear? Or what we do?"

name: Renly Baratheon
text:
While any other character has renown, Renly Baratheon gains renown.
While any other character has stealth, Renly Baratheon gains stealth.

name: Robert Baratheon
text: Renown. Response: after Robert Baratheon is killed, move all power from all characters to your House card. [doomed]
flavor: "Robert was the true steel." -Donal Noye

name: Selyse Baratheon
text: Any phase: discard 1 power from a character you control to choose and stand a character you control (limit 3 per round).
flavor: With prominent ears, a sharp nose, and the faintest hint of a mustache on her upper lip.

name: Ser Cortnay Penrose
text: Ser Cortnay Penrose gets +1 STR for each [baratheon] character in any dead pile.
flavor: "May the Others bugger your Lord of Light"

name: ∞ Stormland Heir
text: Renown. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to return Stormland Heir from your dead pile to play.

name: Braavosi Spy
text: Marshalling: kneel Braavosi Spy to choose a non-Limited location. Until the end of the phase, treat that location as though its text box were blank.

name: Converted Maester
text: Response: after you play Converted Maester from your hand, choose a card in any dead pile. Move that card to its owner's discard pile.

name: Mother of Shadows
text: While there is at least one doomed card in any dead pile, Mother of Shadows is immune to opponents' events and character abilities.

name: Pentoshi Captain
text: You may pay a +1 gold penalty (cannot be ignored) while playing Pentoshi Captain from your hand. Response: after you play Pentoshi Captain with a gold penalty, move all power from a character to Pentoshi Captain.

name: Ser Axell's Elite
text: No attachments. Deadly.

name: Knight Commander
text: Knight Commander gets +1 STR while you control an Army character.

name: Student of the Stars
flavor: Cressen had never seen a comet half so bright, nor yet that color, that terrible color, the color of blood and flame and sunsets.

name: Storm's End
text: Deathbound. Challenges: kneel Storm's End and kneel 1 influence to choose and stand 2 characters. [doomed]
flavor: Yet Storm;s End endured, through centuries and tens of centuries, a castle like no other.

name: The Iron Throne
text: Response: after a card is placed into any player's dead pile, kneel The Iron Throne to choose and discard a non-unique attachment from play.

name: Aegon's Sept
text: Challenges: discard Aegon's Sept from play (cannot be saved) to return a card with printed cost X or lower from your discard pile to your hand. X is the number of characters participating in the challenge.

name: Crumbling Stone Dragon
text: Deathbound. Marshalling: kneel Crumbling Stone Dragon to lower the cost of the next [baratheon] card you play this phase by 1. [doomed]

name: Obsidian Ramparts
text: Response: after a character claims power for renown, look at up to the top 2 cards of your deck. Then, put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck and return the to the top of your deck in any order.

name: Stormlands Fiefdoms
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Stormlands Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next [baratheon] card you play this phase by 1. +1 influence

name: Ironborn's Strength
text: Attached character gets +4 STR.
flavor: "We are the Ironborn, and once we were conquerors. Our writ ran everywhere the sound of waves was heard." -Euron Greyjoy

name: Aeron Damphair
text: Immune to character abilities. Any phase: kneel Aeron Damphair and kneel 2 influence to discard up to 2 power from a character or House card.
flavor: Aeron Damphair was a prophet. He did not suffer petty lords ordering him about like some thrall.

name: Euron Crow's Eye
text:
Immune to events.
While Euron Crow's Eye is standing, [greyjoy] characters you control gain stealth.
flavor: Only one living kraken has never known defeat. Only one has never bent his knee.

name: Gormond Goodbrother
text: Response: after Gormond Goodbrother is killed, claim 2 power for your House.
flavor: Three tall sons had been born to Goodbrother's wife, and it was said that no man could tell one son from the others.

name: Theon Greyjoy
text: Stealth. Theon Greyjoy does not kneel to attack or defend while you control at least 1 Warship location. [doomed]
flavor: Let Theon be born again from the sea.

name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Immune to events. Challenges: kneel 2 influence to put into play a Warship location from your hand.
flavor: "Lord Captain of the Iron Fleet, and a fearsome warrior."

name: ∞ Island Heir
text: Response: after Island Heir is declared as an attacker, choose and stand a Warship. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to return Island Heir form your dead pile to play.

name: Bannermen to the Kraken
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after you win an unopposed challenge in which Bannermen of the Kraken is participating, it claims 2 power.

name: Deadly Axeman
text: While there is at least one doomed card in any dead pile, Deadly Axeman gets +3 STR.
flavor: "And I say all of Westeros is dying. Those who follow me will feast to the end of their days." -Euron Crow's Eye

name: Sea Raiders
text: Limited. No attachments.
flavor: "You are to harry the Stony Shore, raiding the fishing villages and sinking any ships you chance to meet." -Lord Balon Greyjoy

name: Prophet of the Waves
text: Any phase: kneel Prophet of the Waves to choose a location. Until the end of the phase, that location gains Deathbound.
flavor: "The sea is never weary. I must be as tireless" -Aeron Damphair

name: Rider through the Storm
flavor: He was not fond of horses, but necessity required that he ride. A storm was brewing, he could hear it in the waves.

name: Vanguard Axeman
text: Response: discard Vanguard Axeman from play (cannot be saved) to cancel the effects of an event.
flavor: "That is not the Old Way. Ironmen fight with swords and axes, not by flinging rocks."

name: Longship "Black Wind"
text: Deathbound. Response: kneel Longship "Black Wind" and kneel X influence to cancel the effects of an event with influence cost X or lower. [doomed]

name: Longship "Great Kraken"
text: Deathbound. Challenges: kneel Longship "Great Kraken" to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +4 STR. [doomed]

name: Longship "Silence"
text: Deathbound. Response: after you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Longship "Silence" to choose a character. That character claims 2 power. [doomed]

name: The Iron Throne
text: Response: after a card is placed into any player's dead pile, kneel The Iron Throne to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be killed.

name: Blazewater Coast
text: Response: after a character is saved, discard the top 2 cards from any player's deck.
flavor: "Rise." he told the spluttering boy. " You have drowned and been returned to us."

name: Coastal Tower
text: Deathbound. Marshalling: kneel Coastal Tower to lower the cost of the next [greyjoy] card you play this phase by 1. [doomed]

name: Iron Island Fiefdoms
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Iron Island Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next [greyjoy] card you play this phase by 1. +1 influence

name: Ten Towers Battlements
text: Challenges: kneel Ten Towers Battlements to choose 2 characters. Until the end of the phase, switch those characters' printed STR.
flavor: Ten Towers was airier, more comfortable, better sited than ancient Harlaw Hall.

name: Field of Fire
text: House targaryen only. Deathbound Challenges: kneel 3 influence to kill all defending characters. [doomed]

name: Blue Eyes, Black Skin
text: When revealed, if you have two or more The Others plots in your used pile, choose a character and kill it.

name: Breach their Defenses
text: You cannot claim power for unopposed challenges.

name: Called by the Gods
text: When revealed, if there are one or less Kingdom cards in your used pile search your deck for a character, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Dark and Full of Terror
text: When revealed, choose X characters and/or locations and kneel them. X equals the number of The Others plots in your used pile.

name: Fortified Position
text: Treat all characters as if their text box was empty (except for Traits).

name: For Duty
text: Characters you control have +1 STR

name: Found by Destiny
text: When revealed, if there are one or less Kingdom cards in your used pile search your deck for a location, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Hear me Roar
text:
House Lannister only.
Characters without an [intrigue] Icon have -1 STR

name: Ours is the Fury
text:
House Baratheon only.
When revealed, choose a character in any discard pile. Put that character in its owners dead pile.

name: Behind Safe Walls
text: Characters cannot be killed.

name: He Who Must Not Be Named
text: When revealed, choose attachment or location. Every player has to choose a card of the chosen type the he or she controls and discard it.

name: Winter is Coming
text:
House Stark only.
In every challenge where you have at least one participating character add +2 to your total STR.
